settings.title: CIRCOLO MIRROR
settings.title02: Live Active and Connected  Every Day

settings.title:
Live Community Fitness
Classes Every Day
settings.text:
• Join live fitness classes from your community and nationwide
  • Stretch, move, dance and sweat together with community

settings.title: Unlimited Senior-level Fitness Classes and Programs at Your Fingertips
settings.text:
• Senior classes and programs at every fitness level
  • YOGA, Tai Chi, Stretching, Strength, Cardio, Dancing, Qigong, Pilates, and much more
  • Stream any Youtube video and follow along
  • Collect your favorite classes and come back to them anytime
  • Super responsive touchscreen makes everything you like a singletap away

settings.title:
Optimized Hardware and
Software for Delight
settings.text:
• Premium video and audio hardware
  • Bigger font, easy navigation
  • No mobile phone is required

settings.content: One tap to join any of your Zoom classes instantly
Wide-angle HD camera to allow your instructor or physical therapist to see your whole form and give feedback
Big screen, premium sound and full-length mirror for immersive experience
Invite friends and work out together
